title: Experience Switzerland's #1 Hotel
description: Experience the #1 hotel in Switzerland with a three-night stay at the luxurious Hôtel d'Angleterre Genève and receive full daily breakfasts, welcome drink and amenity on arrival, free public transport card, daily bottle of water and complimentary Wi-Fi for two adults.

title: Swiss Splendour in Heritage Five-Star Escape Overlooking Lake Geneva
description: Discover the fairytale city of your dreams with a stay at the five-star Hotel Metropole Geneve - a heritage building on the shores of Lake Geneva. Indulge in utmost luxury when sipping a crisp glass of wine on the terrace of MET Rooftop Lounge, overlooking the picture-perfect lake vistas, and enjoy a refined two- or three-course lunch at La Piazza Del Gusto Restaurant, serving seasonal flavours with a creative and modern twist on classic European dishes.

vendor_name: The Woodward, an Oetker Collection Hotel
title: Geneva Lakeside Luxury Suites with Two Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description:
Redefining Swiss luxury as Geneva's first all-suite hotel, each room serves as a private sanctuary with views of Lake Geneva's shimmering waters. Culinary excellence shines at L'Atelier Robuchon (recipient of two Michelin stars) and nature-inspired Le Jardinier, while the two-story Guerlain Spa offers an ethereal escape with its indoor pool and exclusive treatments.

Gracing the prestigious Quai Wilson, this hotel commands breathtaking views of the majestic French Alps, crowned by Mont Blanc's snow-capped peak. From the Old Town's cobblestone charm to Rue du Rhône's sophisticated boutiques, this enviable address places guests moments from Geneva's cultural treasures.

title: Five-Star Geneva Riverside Retreat within Landmark Heritage Hotel
description: Peaceful river scenes and a majestic mountain backdrop make for a picturesque escape at the five-star Mandarin Oriental, Geneva, Europe's first luxury hotel built after WWII. Thanks to the hotel's impeccable location on the River Rhône, you'll be within walking distance of St. Peter’s Cathedral, as well as Geneva's Old Town with its charming boutiques. Gourmands seeking their next fine-dining adventure can tantalise their tastebuds at the three outstanding onsite eateries. Enjoy exquisite Omakase at SACHI, a stylish Japanese restaurant and bar, or for mouthwatering Peruvian cuisine, dine at Yakumanka, where the Pisco Bar serves up cocktails inspired by South America. The all-day MO Bar is the perfect spot for wine and Mediterranean bites.

title: Geneva Five-Star InterContinental Escape with Lavish Outdoor Pool
description: Immerse yourself in Geneva's staggering alpine beauty with an opulent stay at InterContinental Genève - ideally positioned on the scenic Left Bank, moments from the world-renowned Lake Geneva and the Palais des Nations. Beyond the crystal chandeliers and classic décor of this exceptional hotel is a lavish outdoor pool with breathtaking views of the snow-capped Mont Blanc. Three chic restaurants await gourmands and a tranquil day spa and fitness centre will keep you rejuvenated.

title: Gorgeous Geneva Alpine Stay near the Airport
description: Close to the heart of the commercial centre, Crown Plaza Geneva, an IHG Hotel, is a refined stay on the doorstep of gorgeous Geneva. Savour a delectable seasonal meal at restaurant Seventy5 or indulge in an intimate gastronomic experience at the Fondue Chalet. Enjoy the crisp Alpine air while taking in the many boutiques and chocolatiers of this cosmopolitan city, walk the cobblestone streets and discover historic buildings or lose yourself in the city's famous secret passages.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Geneva, an IHG Hotel

title: Five-Star Geneva Opulent Lakefront Escape
description:
Place yourself among staggering alpine beauty with an opulent stay at Hotel d’Angleterre - nestled right on the edge of Geneva’s gorgeous lakefront, and ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. Lovers of breathtaking views can gaze across to the Jet d’Eau and snow-capped Mont Blanc in the distance, adorers of fine foods can roam the idyllic streets in search of soul-warming local fare, and history buffs can discover the medieval charm of the Old Town.

This spectacular hotel has rolled out the red carpet for celebrities and royalty from around the globe since the late 19th-century, and now it's your turn to experience a whole new world of luxury and unrivalled hospitality. Be welcomed into the lobby by uniformed doormen and marvel at the elegantly decorated spaces where rich textures and patterns are complemented by marble and brass finishes for a touch of old-world finesse. Indulge in a memorable high tea at the glass-fronted Windows Restaurant overlooking the lake and enjoy an intimate aperitif or creative cocktails at The Leopard Bar, where you can find live music. Or, to explore further afield, simply step outside the hotel and onto the complimentary boat shuttle service and be whisked away across the shimmering lake
